[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   | Usage:	reviewdog [flags]
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   | 	reviewdog accepts any compiler or linter results from stdin and filters
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   | 	them by diff for review. reviewdog also can posts the results as a comment to
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   | 	GitHub if you use reviewdog in CI service.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   | Flags:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -conf string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	config file path
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -diff string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	diff command (e.g. "git diff") for local reporter. Do not use --relative flag for git command.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -efm value
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	list of supported machine-readable format and errorformat (https://github.com/reviewdog/errorformat)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -f string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	format name (run -list to see supported format name) for input. It's also used as tool name in review comment if -name is empty
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -f.diff.strip int
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	option for -f=diff: strip NUM leading components from diff file names (equivalent to 'patch -p') (default is 1 for git diff) (default 1)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -fail-on-error
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	Returns 1 as exit code if any errors/warnings found in input
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -filter-mode value
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	how to filter checks results. [added, diff_context, file, nofilter].
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			"added" (default)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Filter by added/modified diff lines.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			"diff_context"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Filter by diff context, which can include unchanged lines.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				i.e. changed lines +-N lines (e.g. N=3 for default git diff).
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			"file"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Filter by added/modified file.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			"nofilter"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Do not filter any results.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -guess
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	guess Pull Request ID by branch name and commit SHA
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -level string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	report level currently used for github-pr-check reporter ("info","warning","error").
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -list
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	list supported pre-defined format names which can be used as -f arg
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -name string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	tool name in review comment. -f is used as tool name if -name is empty
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -reporter string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	reporter of reviewdog results. (local, github-check, github-pr-check, github-pr-review, gitlab-mr-discussion, gitlab-mr-commit)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"local" (default)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Report results to stdout.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"github-check"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Report results to GitHub Check. It works both for Pull Requests and commits.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			For Pull Request, you can see report results in GitHub PullRequest Check
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			tab and can control filtering mode by -filter-mode flag.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			There are two options to use this reporter.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Option 1) Run reviewdog from GitHub Actions w/ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Note that it reports result to GitHub Actions log console for Pull
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Requests from fork repository due to GitHub Actions restriction.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				https://help.github.com/en/articles/virtual-environments-for-github-actions#github_token-secret
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Set REVIEWDOG_GITHUB_API_TOKEN with secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN. e.g.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     						REVIEWDOG_GITHUB_API_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Option 2) Install reviewdog GitHub Apps
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				1. Install reviewdog Apps. https://github.com/apps/reviewdog
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				2. Set REVIEWDOG_TOKEN or run reviewdog CLI in trusted CI providers.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				You can get token from https://reviewdog.app/gh/<owner>/<repo-name>.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export REVIEWDOG_TOKEN="xxxxx"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				Note: Token is not required if you run reviewdog in Travis CI.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"github-pr-check"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Same as github-check reporter but it only supports Pull Requests.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"github-pr-review"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Report results to GitHub review comments.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			1. Set REVIEWDOG_GITHUB_API_TOKEN environment variable.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens and create new Personal access token with repo scope.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			For GitHub Enterprise:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export GITHUB_API="https://example.githubenterprise.com/api/v3"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"gitlab-mr-discussion"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Report results to GitLab MergeRequest discussion.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			1. Set REVIEWDOG_GITLAB_API_TOKEN environment variable.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Go to https://gitlab.com/profile/personal_access_tokens
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			CI_API_V4_URL (defined by Gitlab CI) as the base URL for the Gitlab API automatically.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Alternatively, GITLAB_API can also be defined, and it will take precedence over the former:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export GITLAB_API="https://example.gitlab.com/api/v4"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"gitlab-mr-commit"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Same as gitlab-mr-discussion, but report results to GitLab comments for
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			each commits in Merge Requests.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"gerrit-change-review"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Report results to Gerrit Change comments.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			1. Set GERRIT_USERNAME and GERRIT_PASSWORD for basic authentication or
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			GIT_GITCOOKIE_PATH for git cookie based authentication.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			2. Set GERRIT_CHANGE_ID, GERRIT_REVISION_ID GERRIT_BRANCH abd GERRIT_ADDRESS
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			For example:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export GERRIT_CHANGE_ID=myproject~master~I1293efab014de2
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export GERRIT_REVISION_ID=ed318bf9a3c
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export GERRIT_BRANCH=master
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				$ export GERRIT_ADDRESS=http://localhost:8080
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		"bitbucket-code-report"
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			Create Bitbucket Code Report via Code Insights
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			(https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/BITBUCKET/Code+insights).
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			You can set custom report name with:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			If running as part of Bitbucket Pipelines no additional configurations is needed.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			If running outside of Bitbucket Pipelines you need to provide git repo data
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			(see documentation below for local reporters) and BitBucket credentials:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			- For Basic Auth you need to set following env variables:
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     				  BITBUCKET_USER and BITBUCKET_PASSWORD
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			- For AccessToken Auth you need to set BITBUCKET_ACCESS_TOKEN
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			To post results to Bitbucket Server specify BITBUCKET_SERVER_URL.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		For GitHub Enterprise and self hosted GitLab, set
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		REVIEWDOG_INSECURE_SKIP_VERIFY to skip verifying SSL (please use this at your own risk)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			$ export REVIEWDOG_INSECURE_SKIP_VERIFY=true
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		For non-local reporters, reviewdog automatically get necessary data from
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		environment variable in CI service (GitHub Actions, Travis CI, Circle CI, drone.io, GitLab CI, Bitbucket Pipelines).
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		You can set necessary data with following environment variable manually if
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     		you want (e.g. run reviewdog in Jenkins).
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			$ export CI_PULL_REQUEST=14 # Pull Request number (e.g. 14)
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			$ export CI_COMMIT="$(git rev-parse @)" # SHA1 for the current build
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			$ export CI_REPO_OWNER="haya14busa" # repository owner
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     			$ export CI_REPO_NAME="reviewdog" # repository name
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	 (default "local")
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -runners string
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	comma separated runners name to run in config file. default: run all runners
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -strip int

[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |     	enable "tee"-like mode which outputs tools's output as is while reporting results to -reporter. Useful for debugging as well.
[84649c39-a582-4122-b02f-ba42df607b13/checkstyle]   |   -version
